description: This file contains a shell function 'oci' which manages OCI (Open Container Initiative) images using the 'umoci' tool. It performs operations like initializing, unpacking, configuring, and repacking OCI container images, as well as setting labels, environment variables, ports, and other configurations.

methods.name: oci
methods.description: Shell function that manages OCI container images using umoci, including initialization, unpacking, configuration, and repacking.
